name: King Fomor
description: The King Fomor is a gargantuan celestial creature with exceptional physical strength and agility, notable for its impressive resilience and potent spellcasting capabilities.
memorable: It commands immense power, has a high saving throw proficiencies, and can alternate its size between Gargantuan and Medium.
goals: To dominate the battlefield and exert control over its foes through powerful spells and devastating melee attacks.
relations: Could be encountered alongside other celestial beings or serve higher celestial entities.
environment: Typically found in celestial realms or places of significant divine influence.
strengths: High saving throws, spellcasting abilities, damage immunities, and formidable melee attacks.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to effects targeting Charisma due to its reliance on that ability for spellcasting.
attacks: Devastating melee attacks with bludgeoning and radiant damage, capable of pushing foes and knocking them prone.
most_powerful_ability: Innate spellcasting with a high Spell Save DC of 23, allowing it to control and damage enemies effectively.
senses: The King Fomor possesses truesight out to 120 feet, allowing it to see through illusions and invisibility.
additional_information: Immune to radiant damage and damage from nonmagical weapons.
Unique ability to switch its size between Gargantuan and Medium.
Can use a powerful shout that stuns nearby creatures.
Has a notable spellcasting ability, requiring no material components.
Can recover from negative effects while bloodied.
spellcasting: Can cast spells such as flame strike, hold monster, and greater restoration, with a focus on control and damage.
